接口的使用
org.apache.catalina.Context

  • 使用Context的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina  
    org.apache.catalina.authenticator
    This package contains Authenticator implementations for the various supported authentication methods (BASIC, DIGEST, and FORM).
    org.apache.catalina.connector  
    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.catalina.deploy
    This package contains Java objects that represent complex data structures from the web application deployment descriptor file (web.xml).
    org.apache.catalina.ha.context  
    org.apache.catalina.manager  
    org.apache.catalina.manager.host  
    org.apache.catalina.realm
    This package contains Realm implementations for the various supported realm technologies for authenticating users and identifying their associated roles.
    org.apache.catalina.session
    This package contains the standard Manager and Session implementations that represent the collection of active sessions and the individual sessions themselves, respectively, that are associated with a Context.
    org.apache.catalina.startup  
    org.apache.catalina.util  

    • org.apache.catalina中Context的使用

      参数类型为Context的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      SecurityConstraint[] Realm.findSecurityConstraints(Request request, Context context)
      Return the SecurityConstraints configured to guard the request URI for this request, or null if there is no such constraint.
      boolean Realm.hasResourcePermission(Request request, Response response, SecurityConstraint[] constraint, Context context)
      Perform access control based on the specified authorization constraint.

      Creates a new session cookie for the given session ID
      static java.lang.String ApplicationSessionCookieConfig.getSessionCookieName(Context context)
      已过时。 
      Replaced by SessionConfig.getSessionCookieName(Context). This will be removed in Tomcat 8.0.x.
      static java.lang.String ApplicationSessionCookieConfig.getSessionUriParamName(Context context)
      已过时。 
      Replaced by SessionConfig.getSessionUriParamName(Context). This will be removed in Tomcat 8.0.x.

      已过时。 
      No longer necessary since StandardContext implements the Container interface.

    • org.apache.catalina.startup中Context的使用

      实现Context的org.apache.catalina.startup中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  FailedContext
      An implementation of Context that is used as a place-holder for deployed applications when their deployment fails and a Context instance (usually StandardContext but may be any Context implementation) cannot be created.
      声明为Context的org.apache.catalina.startup中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected Context ContextConfig.context
      The Context we are associated with.
      返回Context的org.apache.catalina.startup中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Context Tomcat.addContext(Host host, java.lang.String contextPath, java.lang.String dir) 
      Context Tomcat.addContext(Host host, java.lang.String contextPath, java.lang.String contextName, java.lang.String dir) 
      Context Tomcat.addContext(java.lang.String contextPath, java.lang.String docBase)
      Add a context - programmatic mode, no web.xml used.
      Context Tomcat.addWebapp(Host host, java.lang.String contextPath, java.lang.String docBase) 
      Context Tomcat.addWebapp(Host host, java.lang.String contextPath, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String docBase)
      已过时。 
      Use Tomcat.addWebapp(Host, String, String)
      Context Tomcat.addWebapp(java.lang.String contextPath, java.lang.String docBase)
      This is equivalent to adding a web application to Tomcat's webapps directory.
      Context Embedded.createContext(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String docBase)
      已过时。 
      Create, configure, and return a Context that will process all HTTP requests received from one of the associated Connectors, and directed to the specified context path on the virtual host to which this Context is connected.
      Context TldConfig.getContext()
      已过时。 
      Unused - will be removed in 8.0.x
      参数类型为Context的org.apache.catalina.startup中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Process a Resource annotation to set up a Resource.

      Static version of Tomcat.addServlet(String, String, Servlet).
      static Wrapper Tomcat.addServlet(Context ctx, java.lang.String servletName, java.lang.String servletClass)

      Add watched resources to the specified Context.
      static void Tomcat.initWebappDefaults(Context ctx)
      Static version of Tomcat.initWebappDefaults(String)
      static void WebAnnotationSet.loadApplicationAnnotations(Context context)
      Process the annotations on a context.
      protected static void WebAnnotationSet.loadApplicationFilterAnnotations(Context context)
      Process the annotations for the filters.
      protected static void WebAnnotationSet.loadApplicationListenerAnnotations(Context context)
      Process the annotations for the listeners.
      protected static void WebAnnotationSet.loadApplicationServletAnnotations(Context context)
      Process the annotations for the servlets.
      protected static void WebAnnotationSet.loadClassAnnotation(Context context, java.lang.Class<?> classClass)
      Process the annotations on a context for a given className.
      protected static void WebAnnotationSet.loadFieldsAnnotation(Context context, java.lang.Class<?> classClass) 
      protected static void WebAnnotationSet.loadMethodsAnnotation(Context context, java.lang.Class<?> classClass) 
      void HostConfig.manageApp(Context context)
      Add a new Context to be managed by us.
      void Embedded.removeContext(Context context)
      已过时。 
      Remove the specified Context from the set of defined Contexts for its associated Host.
      void TldConfig.setContext(Context context)
      已过时。 
      Unused - will be removed in 8.0.x
